title: Cottage in Ben Lomond
posting_body: This bright, sunny beautifully appointed detached cottage/loft in Ben Lomond is a rare find.
ft, it boasts a full kitchen with a dishwasher, an in unit washer/dryer combo, propane heat, a private deck, a small storage area and loads of sunshine and atmosphere.
Just 1 mile from Hwy 9, this unit is fully or partially furnished and suited for one person only (no exceptions).
Tenant pays propane, water and electricity (on it's own meter) Current tenant pays approx $125 per month with conscientious use.
Ideal tenant is very quiet, exceptionally tidy and financially stable.
There is no smoking of any sort on the property and no pets.
Application: Please email me a little about yourself.
If we think its a fit, application will need to include:
